title: The Villain's Princess
description: How did my dashing prince become so dark?In the mystical kingdom of Silverhaven, sorcerer king Gareth commands the dead, Princess Theodora lies dormant under a potent curse, and the arrival of benevolent Prince Julian forms a complex love triangle, intertwining love, power, and the supernatural. "The Villain's Princess" seamlessly blends the enchanting darkness of Alice in Wonderland, the haunting allure of Faust, and the dreamlike mystique of Sleeping Beauty and Beauty and the Beast. Shadows harbor secrets in a realm where every step walks a fine line between enchantment and horror. The narrative unfolds as princess and villain navigate the intricate dance of curses and desires, blurring the boundaries between good and evil in a captivating retelling that challenges conventional fairy tale norms.Can Theodora conquer a haunted past, dark magic, and her mental health in a dark symphony with the leader of the undead?
author: Abby McCormick
